/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -Wno-unused-local-typedefs -O3 -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -DLINUX=1  -pthread -D_REENTRANT  -march=native -fopenmp -m64 -pthread -I$(MKLROOT)/include  -fopenmp  -ldl CMakeFiles/poisson_pbc.dir/examples/Poisson/poisson_pbc.cpp.o  -o poisson_pbc -rdynamic -lboost_thread-mt -lboost_system-mt -lboost_iostreams-mt -lboost_program_options-mt -lboost_filesystem-mt libRmgLibShared.so -lboost_thread-mt -lboost_system-mt -lboost_iostreams-mt -lboost_program_options-mt -lboost_filesystem-mt /usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/openmpi/lib64/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/openmpi/lib64/libmpi.so libRmgLibShared.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/emil/Projects/RMG_RELEASE1/codes/RmgLib:/usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/openmpi/lib64
